allow:
Bash(docker exec pl_scout_postgres psql -U pl_scout_user -d pl_scout -c "
SELECT mp.champion_id, COUNT(*) as picks, SUM(CAST(mp.win AS INTEGER)) as wins, p.summoner_name
FROM match_participants mp
JOIN matches m ON mp.match_id = m.id
JOIN players p ON mp.player_id = p.id
WHERE mp.team_id = ''5d7b745e-5e2f-469c-bda3-32d2312ab6b4''
  AND m.is_tournament_game = true
GROUP BY mp.champion_id, p.summoner_name
ORDER BY picks DESC
LIMIT 10;
")

Bash(docker exec pl_scout_postgres psql -U pl_scout_user -d pl_scout -c "
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_participants,
       COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE team_id IS NOT NULL) as with_team_id,
       COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE team_id IS NULL) as without_team_id
FROM match_participants mp
JOIN matches m ON mp.match_id = m.id
WHERE m.winning_team_id = ''5d7b745e-5e2f-469c-bda3-32d2312ab6b4''
   OR m.losing_team_id = ''5d7b745e-5e2f-469c-bda3-32d2312ab6b4'';
")
Bash(for file in analytics matches scouting stats champions)
Bash(for file in stats scouting champions)
Bash(for file in players.py scouting.py stats.py teams.py)
Bash(for file in scouting.py stats.py teams.py)
